column4: I'm having an issue with a nvidia GeForce FX 5200 card,  when ever I restart x after loading the restricted driver , x freezes after a few seconds.  any thoughts ?
Weird, had same card in Feisty, no probs
can I get a look at your xorg.conf file ?
can I still get a look at your xorg.conf,  maybe something will jump out at me
It's really simple, but it can run compiz w/o problems
simple is good, right now this comp won'T even recognise a simple  Device "nvidia"  line
uninstall your nvidia driver with it
not running the nvidia driver at the m
Still, it needs to be uninstalled
NP, chill, give and receive help
this channels bleeds me dry on a regular basis, I'm owed a littlt tit for tat
